intro.title: Hey, I'm Sam
intro.text: A **Software Engineer** living in Darwen. Iâ€™m also an average climber, runner and Apple enthusiast. I work on the **Frontend team** at **On The Beach**, in sunny **Darwen** ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§.

duties: Work with team members to come up with software requirements.
Be actively involved in stand-ups and retrospectives.
Implement new features on in-house CRM and inspection software.
Listen to and respond to feedback from software users.
Build the frontend of Wordpress websites.
Design MySQL database tables for Wordpress plugins.
Create custom Wordpress plugins tailored for the clients needs.
Collaborate with team members to come up with new UX ideas.
Regularly pair/mob code with other team members and be actively involved in code reviews/feedback.
Be active in agile processes such as stand-ups, sprint refinements, sprint planning and retrospectives.
Use a test driven development approach for all implementations.
Write quality, performant and maintainable code for all microclients and other in-house web applications.

projects.title: Currency Converterr
projects.description: A simple currency converter web app. I designed the app and developed the front end in React. I coded the back end API in NodeJS (TypeScript). The API gathers latest currency data every 3 days.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A simple calculator web app which was built so I could learn React Hooks. I designed the app and developed the front end in React.

projects.title: Lifetime Project
projects.description: A small web application that shows you how much time you have left to live your life. It was very much inspired by Dhanish Gajjar's Lifeproject.

projects.title: Simple Todos
projects.description: A very simple web application that will add/remove todos using the browser's localStorage feature.
